price: 6. Ils disputent avec toi de la vérité qui s’est déjà révélée en toute clarté, comme s’ils étaient conduits à la mort et la voyaient devant eux.
arabic: يُجَٰدِلُونَكَ فِي ٱلۡحَقِّ بَعۡدَ مَا تَبَيَّنَ كَأَنَّمَا يُسَاقُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَوۡتِ وَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yujādilūnaka fī al-ḥaqi baʿdamā tabayyana ka-annamā yusāqūna ilā al-mawti wahum yanẓurūna
